# Path Separator

> Windows path segment separator.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var PATH_SEP_WIN32 = require( '@stdlib/constants/string/path-sep-win32' );
```

#### PATH_SEP_WIN32

Windows path segment separator.

```javascript
var sep = PATH_SEP_WIN32;
// returns '\\'
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- eslint no-undef: "error" -->

```javascript
var PATH_SEP_WIN32 = require( '@stdlib/constants/string/path-sep-win32' );

var parts;
var path;

path = 'foo\\bar\\baz';
parts = path.split( PATH_SEP_WIN32 );
// returns ['foo','bar','baz']

path = 'foo/bar/baz';
parts = path.split( PATH_SEP_WIN32 );
// returns ['foo/bar/baz' ]
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
